Package Model

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
Model.Deck
public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
Deck handles the card decks of That's Life.

This class handles various card-related features. These features include (1) card deck generation, (2) drawing of cards, and (3) shuffling of card decks. A certain instance of Deck can only contain a single type of card.

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck​(java.lang.String type)
      The sole constructor of the object. Allocates a new Deck object (creates a new card deck).
      Parameters:
      type - the type of card to be generated

  • Method Details

    • generateActionDeck

      private void generateActionDeck()
      Generates and populates this instance of Deck with Action Cards. This also autmatically shuffles the deck generated.

    • generateBlueDeck

      private void generateBlueDeck()
      Generates and populates this instance of Deck with Blue Cards.

    • generateHouseDeck

      private void generateHouseDeck()
      Generates and populates this instance of Deck with House Cards.

    • generateSalaryDeck

      private void generateSalaryDeck()
      Generates and populates this instance of Deck with Salary Cards.

    • generateCareerDeck

      private void generateCareerDeck()
      Generates and populates this instance of Deck with Career Cards.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard()
      Gets a card from this deck and separates it temporarily from the original card deck. Numerous conditions are being checked by this method, depending on the type of card this instance of Deck contains.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard​(int index)
      Gets a card from this deck and separates it temporarily from the original card deck. This is mainly used for House Card decks, where the parameter index is used to determine which House Card to draw.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the House Card to be drawn

    • drawNoDegreeCareer

      public void drawNoDegreeCareer()
      Gets a card from this deck and separates it temporarily from the original card deck. This is mainly used for drawing Career Cards that does not require a player degree.

    • getActionCard

      private Card getActionCard()
      Returns the Action Card currently on top of the deck. This also checks if the Action Card deck is already empty. If it is empty, this automatically reshuffles the deck.
      Returns:
      the Action Card on top of the deck

    • isOwned

      private boolean isOwned​(Card card)
      Checks if a certain card is owned by a player. This is only applicable to cards of type Player Card.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the card is owned; false otherwise.

    • shuffleDeck

      public void shuffleDeck()
      Shuffles the cards inside this deck. Utilizes the Collections class to effectively rearrange the cards.

    • clearDrawnCards

      public void clearDrawnCards()
      Empties the drawn cards of this deck.

    • getCardDrawn

      public Card getCardDrawn()
      Returns the first card drawn from this deck.
      Returns:
      first drawn card from this deck

    • getSecondCardDrawn

      public Card getSecondCardDrawn()
      Returns the second card drawn from this deck.
      Returns:
      second drawn card from this deck

    • getCards

      public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCards()
      Returns all the cards currently in this deck. This is mainly used for decks that contains House Cards.
      Returns:
      all the cards of this deck

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
